channel.title: About Me - Terry Chen
channel.description: CS @ Northwestern, thinking about product. My focus areas include multi-agent systems, content understanding, and scaling creative workflows through AI multipliers. In my free time, I like to go hiking and travelling.
channel.copyright: Â© 2025 Terry Chen. All rights reserved.

image.title: Terry Chen
image.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: CrowdListening | Evanston, Illinois
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Extracting actionable insights from large-scale distributed online conversations. Engineered content optimization features that generate variations and simulate engagement through agentic crowds.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Northwestern C3 Lab | Evanston, Illinois
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Built LLM system that performs real-time conversation processing and detects conceptual misconceptions. Facilitated Socratic learning through synchronous voice interactions.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Northwestern Delta Lab | Evanston, Illinois
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Developed LLM system that identifies and connects students with similar regulation gaps, achieving 88% precision and 89% recall in categorization.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Ouraca | Palo Alto, California
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Making lifelong learning engaging and accessible. Research agent ai and generation workflows. Designed and implemented an agentic LLM learning companion, working on search, recommendation, etc.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: TikTok | San Jose, California
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Leveraging billion parameter data to provide actionable trends and insights for key agencies. Designed keyword clustering methods for insight extraction, worked on creative video ad creation.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
